subject: Re: speak jet sample
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I have the RVG(actually just the white noise amplifier) adapted to 
output random pulses through a schmitt trigger. The pulse rate can be 
varied with the White Noise gain. 

 The chip runs in random mode, but it would be much better if the 
numbers were restricted to allophones only. This way tonight is like 
R2D2 on LSD.

 One thing is certain---I haven't had this much fun in a long time. 
LOL!!

 Frank-S
